CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Participate in Paid Subscription stage positioned above or below the Content Creation or Upload stage?
SRP.A: The Participate in Paid Subscription stage is positioned {below} the Content Creation or Upload stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {linear} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Participate in Paid Subscription?
VE.A: The value of stage Participate in Paid Subscription is {38}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Follow Account?
VE.A: The value of stage Follow Account is {152}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Content Creation or Upload?
VE.A: The value of stage Content Creation or Upload is {71}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is View Content, with a value of {263}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Participate in Paid Subscription, with a value of {38}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Follow Account to stage Join Group or Community?
SC.A: Decreased by {40} Million Users from stage Follow Account to stage Join Group or Community.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage View Content to stage Like or Comment?
SC.A: Decreased by {39} Million Users from stage View Content to stage Like or Comment.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Share Content to stage Follow Account?
SC.A: Decreased by {36} Million Users from stage Share Content to stage Follow Account.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 243? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 91? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Content Creation or Upload} stage has {71}, the {Participate in Paid Subscription} stage has {38}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 91 and 206? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Share Content} stage has {188}, the {Follow Account} stage has {152}, the {Join Group or Community} stage has {112}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Join Group or Community to Content Creation or Upload, or from stage Share Content to Follow Account?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Join Group or Community} to {Content Creation or Upload} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Like or Comment to Share Content, from stage View Content to Like or Comment, or from stage Follow Account to Join Group or Community?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Follow Account} to stage {Join Group or Community} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Join Group or Community} and {Content Creation or Upload} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Content Creation or Upload} and {Participate in Paid Subscription} stages.
